body:
Working on #3852 (rebased of #4105), but now I am getting:
```
$ spack spec -t quinoa
Input spec
--------------------------------
[   ]  quinoa

Normalized
--------------------------------
[   ]  quinoa
[bl ]      ^boost
[bl ]      ^boostmplcartesianproduct
[bl ]      ^charm backend=mpi
[bl ]          ^mpi
[b  ]      ^cmake
[bl ]      ^h5part
[bl ]          ^hdf5+mpi
[bl ]              ^zlib@1.2.5:
[bl ]      ^hypre
[bl ]          ^netlib-lapack+lapacke
[bl ]      ^mad-numdiff
[bl ]      ^pegtl
[bl ]      ^pstreams
[bl ]      ^pugixml
[bl ]      ^random123
[bl ]      ^trilinos+exodus~tpetra
[bl ]          ^glm
[bl ]          ^matio
[bl ]          ^netcdf+mpi
[b  ]              ^m4
[bl ]      ^tut
[b  ]          ^python@2.5:
[bl ]              ^bzip2
[bl ]              ^ncurses
[b  ]                  ^pkg-config
[bl ]              ^openssl
[bl ]              ^readline
[bl ]              ^sqlite

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: There are no valid versions for spectrum-mpi that match ':'
```

Huh?
title: Error: There are no valid versions for spectrum-mpi that match ':'
